articles.description: Travel hassles continued for American Airlines passengers Monday as the carrier canceled more than 300 flights — bringing its total number of cancellations
articles.content:
Travel hassles continued for American Airlines passengers Monday as the carrier canceled more than 300 flights bringing its total number of cancellations since Friday to over 2,000.

articles.title: Samsung smartphone shipment increases in Q3 2021 in North America - BGR India
articles.description: According to the latest research from market research firm Strategy Analytics Samsung grabbed 38 per cent market share while Apple was second at 37 per cent share.
articles.content: Samsung is the top smartphone vendor in North America in Q3 2021 as per latest report from Strategy Analytics. In the third quarter of 2021, the smartphone shipment in North America were down 7 perce… [+2031 chars]

articles.title: NASA, SpaceX’s Crew-3 set for Nov 3 launch; all eyes on Indian-American Raja Chari - Times Now
articles.description: NASA and SpaceX is all set to launch its Crew-3 mission on Nov 3 after bad weather delayed the much awaited Halloween launch. The Crew-3 mission will take four astronauts including Indian American Raja Chari to the ISS.

articles.title: American Airlines cancels nearly 850 flights on Sunday - News24
articles.description: American Airlines canceled nearly 850 domestic and international flights on Sunday, citing staffing shortages and unfavorable weather, pushing total cancellations to 1 739 and counting since Friday.
